alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 9:27AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison and central Washington Counties through 1000 AM CST... At 926 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Strickler, moving northeast at 75 mph.Very heavy sleet and freezing rain is also occurring with this storm. Watch for slick spots that may rapidly develop. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Hindsville... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... War Eagle... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Goshen... Walnut Grove... Larue... Canehill... Best... Morrow... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 52 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
